Articles.Content:
Hello to all Kerbonauts here! Dunno what I should say here. My name isn't important (seriously, call me Aziz, it's easier this way) I live in Poland and I can see mountains from my window, oh, they look nice. Started playing KSP around 0.9 after someone's video on YT. Still having problems with returning from Mun (at low-cost of course), though I already have a probe around Duna.

..why is this forum style so not KSP-themed? Blargh.

Hello Aziz, and welcome!

I expect that you mean 0.90. Version 0.9 came out a long time ago.

I understand that there is a plan to upgrade the forum software. I don't know any more than that, though.

Happy landings!
Hello! Welcome to the forums! And I too would love a more Kerbal-styled forums.

I expect that you mean 0.90. Version 0.9 came out a long time ago.

No, I literally mean 0.9. Played for the first time around late 2011 or early 2012, if I'm not mistaken.

No, I literally mean 0.9. Played for the first time around late 2011 or early 2012, if I'm not mistaken.

That is cool! The game has certainly come a long way since then.

Have you got your Mun return sorted out yet?

Happy landings!
I have! A bit similar to Apollo missions, separate lander and command module etc, finally, and it seems to work!
Welcome, Aziz. Your signature is very kerbal

Ha, thanks (I guess?)

One of my life goals tbh..
